content:
Hochgelerter family

1 Mozes Jakob HOCHGELERTER           1797-98 - Jun 14, 1840 #152
 + Eidel Pessel RAKOWER              1798-1800 - Nov 1, 1846 #432
  2x Chaim HOCHGELERTER              1818 #218 - 1818 #156
  2o Feigel Ester HOCHGELERTER       1819 #381 - after 1890
    * Mendel BARAW                   1797
          banns 1837 #94
    * Michal Hirsz CYPRES            Nov 1, 1801 Krakow - before 1870
          married Apr 28, 1850 #12
        FAMILY LISTING

    + Mala SPEER                     1823 Szebierryn Zamosc - after 1900 (Naftali+Gitl)
          married Nov 4, 1842 #51

             married Mar 19, 1863 #18

             married Jan 23, 1888 #17

    * Jozef Dawid ALTSTADTER         1832/34 Komarnow - after 1900
     3x Moses Jakob ALTSTADTER       Sep 3, 1859 #2087
       + Itel /Jetta BARBER          1863 Krakow
             married Nov 26, 1888 #134
        4x Izak Chaim ALTSTADTER     Oct 27, 1883 #676 - Mar 4, 1971 Antwerp

        4o Gitel (Gizela) ALTSTADTER  Dec 19, 1886 #737
